instructions: Open the Settings app. Go to Notifications . Tap Messages . In iOS 12 and later, tap Lock Screen to disable Message notifications on the lock screen. The blue icon changes to white to indicate that it's disabled. In iOS 11 and earlier, tap the button next to it so that its color changes from green to white. Exit the settings.
Open the Settings app. Go to Notifications . Tap Messages . Tap Show Previews . Choose Never or Off to disable message previews. Exit the Settings app.
